name: Jellyfin Enhanced
overview: Jellyfin Enhanced and Jellyfin Elsewhere for a better Jellyfin experience.
description: A combination of the Jellyfin Enhanced and Jellyfin Elsewhere userscripts, providing a comprehensive set of tweaks and features for Jellyfin.

versions.changelog:
- Fix repeated API calls for arr tags and arr tag links
 - Initialize scripts only if the feature is enabled.
 - Fix duplicate shadows for subtitles
 - Display Genre Tags for Seasons

- Add Brazilian language mapping to country codes
 - Add Russian language support for genre icons
 - Fix advanced auto request
 - Add option to select all seasons

- Add admin page selectors to ignore lists in tag scripts
 - Add Series/Season language detection for item details
 - Add data-lang attributes for CSS targeting
 - Update configPage.html
 - Add Enhanced Settings link to user preferences menu

- Add custom branding options for Elsewhere panel
 - feat: watch progress for item details
 - add styling to support vanilla jellyfin css
 - Add language selection and cache clearing to UI
 - Populate Language Tags in IPEP
 - Improve genre and language detection for Series/Season
 - Add Open Episode Preview keyboard shortcut
 - Better close subtitles dialog
 - Add Jellyseerr URL mapping support
 - Persist active tab in config settings
 - Align placeholders vertically in feature tooltips
 - Add automatic season request feature
 - Update README with download badges for versions
 - Add Jellyseerr watchlist sync and auto-watchlist features
 - Improve translation caching with versioning
 - Update Jellyseerr integration and translation caching docs
 - Improve modal accessibility and keyboard navigation
 - Update README.md
 - Fix version specific logic!

- Ignore tags on chapter card image container
 - Update plugin.js
 - feat: file size info for shows and seasons
 - feat: fetch translations from GitHub with caching and fallback
 - fix: repair translation validation workflow
 - Add Missed translation keys for Elsewhere panel UI elements
 - add spacing after arr-tag-link-icon

- Add Brazilian Portuguese localization
 - Add Turkish localization
 - Fix ampersand replacement in series names for Sonarr links[#182](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/pull/182)
 - Improve user retrieval logic in plugin initialization to fix translations [#168](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/168)
 - Add delayed pause screen with interaction reset [#179](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/179)
 - Fix review layout to support different themes [#178](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/178)
 - Add Letterboxd external links[#181](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/181)
 - Remove watchlist feature (moved to KefinTweaks)
 - Add *arr tags sync and display synced tags as clickable links[#157](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/157)
 - Improve 4K request popup positioning and button styles[#167](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/167)

- Add endpoint for Jellyseerr partial requests setting

- üêõ[BUG] Unable to open user menu on WebOS Fixes [#148](https://github.com/n00bcodr/Jellyfin-Enhanced/issues/148)

 - Improve audio language layout styling (especially on mobile)
 - Add default user settings initialization
 - Improve logging and write logs to JellyfinEnhanced Log file
 - Add manual refresh button to Jellyseerr results
 - Reset all user settings using config directories
 - Add support for Jellyseerr's partial TV season requests setting
 - Fix config check for provider icons on Jellyseerr cards

- Update elsewhere.js resource URLs to use jsdelivr CDN
 - Fix quality tags for TV mode
 - Resetting LanguageTagsEnabled in ResetAllUserSettings
 - fix: add 'Remove from Continue Watching' option on right-click
 - Add 4K request support for Jellyseerr integration
 - Add support for Jellyseerr override rules in requests
 - Add tag position fields to default config mapping
 - Improve config page cache and reset descriptions

- Fix the ordering of Pause Screen setting in the Enhanced Panel

- Add option to set disable custom subtitle styles

- Change Jellyseerr API endpoint for connectivity check

- Integrate watchlist into home sections plugin

- Add TMDB API proxy endpoint

- Allow requests for seasons with status 7

- Add missed languages to mapping

- Fix skip button observer management

- Add admin update check and install

- Improve download status popover handling
 - Add auto-refresh for Jellyseerr UI and modals

- Add Genre Tags
 - Add a closebutton for pausescreen to remove the overlay #50
 - Create Hungarian Translations (#52, #49)
 - Add text shadow to subtitle styles #47

- feat: Watchlist (#48)
 - Depends on Avaiability of Custom Tabs

- Add TMDB reviews feature to item details page
 - Update README.md

- Add option to show streaming providers on Jellyseerr posters
 - Use ApiClient.getUrl to support setups with base url
 - Remove custom z-index styles from pause screen which is causing issues with ASS subtitles

- Add advanced Jellyseerr request options and refactor JS #34
 - Spanish translation (#41)

 - Make readme better to read.

- Internationalization & Translations - Jellyfin Enhanced is now available in multiple* languages!
 - Improve quality tag detection and sorting logic

- Add *arr links integration to plugin
 - Adjust 4K threshold and fix title resolution detection

- Support to request individual seasons
 - Improve resolution detection
 - Change clear all bookmarks shortcut

- Improve Quality Tags logic and styling
 - Minor improvements and bug fixes

- New Features: Add Custom Pause Screen and Quality Tags on posters.
- Behind the scenes: Implement a dedicated log file for easier troubleshooting and improve URL handling.

- Double click/tap on the Jellyseerr Icon to toggle filter to display only Jellyseerr results.
 - Minor: Add more Logging for both client and server.

- Improve Jellyseer Results injection logic, fixes a bug where container is injected even before search results from Jellyfin are available.
 - Fixes a bug where TMDB links open in app making it impossible to navigate elsewhere
 - Fixes Jellyseerr section not rendering properly on some themes
 - Change the color of Jellyseerr Request button.

- Improve Jellyseer Results injection logic, fixes a bug where container is injected even before search results from Jellyfin are available.
 - Fixes a bug where TMDB links open in app making it impossible to navigate elsewhere
 - Fixes Jellyseerr section not rendering properly on some themes
 - Change the color of Jellyseerr Request button.

- *One-Time Setup*: Admins configure the connection once with an API key. No more per-user or per-device logins.
 - *Zero User Configuration*: The integration works automatically for all users across all devices without requiring them to enter any credentials.
 - The API key is managed securely on the server, making the connection more robust and reliable.

- Jellyseerr results and requests through Jellyfin Search!
 - Users can now directly login to Jellyseerr from Jellyfin and search and request items
 - Complete refactor for easy future maintainence

- User customizable shortcuts!
 - Users can now customize shortcuts directly from the enhanced panel
 - New Setting: Auto Picture-in-Picture (PiP)

- New UI Setting: Add available languages with flags in Item Details page
 - Add a new 'Gigantic' Subtitle style and change subtitle units to for better scaling
 - New Schortcut for opening jellyfin enhanced panel, long press user icon in the header (useful for touch devices)
 - Minor: Increase toast blur for better readability
 - Minor: Add debounce for elsewhere panel autocomplete.

- Customizable Shortcuts: The server admin can now set overrides for the existing shortcuts, allowing for personalized key bindings.
 - Improve Elsewhere API failure messages

- Move all the default settings configuration to the config page to give control to the server owner to enable options by default
 - Tabbed interface in config page separating Enhanced settings and Elsewhere settings
 - Minor: Move the startup task to 'Startup Services' instead of creating a separate category
 - Minor: Mobile UI improvements

Use [file-transformation-plugin](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) to 'inject' javascript without modifying index.html
 -This is to help with all the permission issues for docker installs.
 - Fallback if file-transformation-plugin is not installed to the regulat index.html modification
 - Add an option to reset Jellyfin Enhanced settings to default for all users

Initial release. 
 - Combine Jellyfin Enhanced and Jellyfin Elsewhere 
 - Add Remove from Continue Watching 
 - Add a button to open the panel in sidebar

name: JavaScript Injector
overview: Inject custom javascript(s) to the Jellyfin Web UI
description: Inject custom javascript(s) to the Jellyfin Web UI

versions.changelog: - Implement timestamp cache-busting

- Revise repository URL instructions in README
 - refactor: create javascript helper
 - feat: add plugin interface
 - chore: remove unused imports
 - fix: dont validate payload in plugin interface
 - docs: fix example formatting

- Fix script path for installations with base url
 - Please remove this manifest and add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. 
 https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json

- 10.11 Support!
 - Please add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json

- Use [file-transformation-plugin](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) to 'inject' javascript without modifying index.html
 - This is to help with all the permission issues for docker installs.
 - Fallback if file-transformation-plugin is not installed to the regular index.html modification

- Wrap the injected script block with clear HTML comments for safer and more reliable identification. 
- Update removal logic to use specific regex patterns for injection formats, ensuring idempotent upgrades and preventing accidental removal of unrelated scripts.

- Wrap the injected script block with clear HTML comments for safer and more reliable identification. 
- Update removal logic to use specific regex patterns for injection formats, ensuring idempotent upgrades and preventing accidental removal of unrelated scripts.

- Script Visibility 
 - Add an option to only load a script for an authenticated session.
Support multiple scripts and dynamic injection

name: Jellyfin Tweaks
description: Adds useful tweaks to Jellyfin. Based on the original JellyTweaks by gam24.

versions.changelog:
- Fix script path for installations with base url
 - Please remove this manifest and add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. 
 https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json

- 10.11 Support!
 - Please add the manifest for 10.11 if you are on 10.11. https://raw.githubusercontent.com/n00bcodr/jellyfin-plugins/main/10.11/manifest.json
- Add public config endpoint and update JS to use it, was preventing some users to access the plugin configuration

- Use [file-transformation-plugin](https://github.com/IAmParadox27/jellyfin-plugin-file-transformation) to 'inject' javascript without modifying index.html
 - This is to help with all the permission issues for docker installs.
 - Fallback if file-transformation-plugin is not installed to the regular index.html modification

- Complete refactor to use localStorage, no longer modifies core files.
- Added options for Theme Videos, Rewatching, and Episode Images in Next Up.
-Fix logic for Force theme music and backdrops
-Fix logic for Force theme music and backdrops
-Fix logic for Force theme music

- Added Max Days Next Up
- Added Force Disable Next Video Info
- Added Force Theme Music
- Based on gam24's version 1.0.0.4
